howWeWork.subtitle: Get Professional Christmas Lighting In Just 3 Easy Steps

steps.title: Get A Quote
steps.description: We've made getting professional lighting services as simple as possible. Reach out to us for a fast quote it only takes 5-10 seconds. We will receive your request, look at your property information, and get back to you right away with some pricing options.

steps.title: Set A Schedule
steps.description: Once you've received our lighting package options, and have chosen the one that fits your needs the most, we can then get your project booked right away! We will provide you several different options of installation dates to ensure our service works perfectly around your schedule.

steps.title: Sit-back & Relax
steps.description: Once we've got you on the schedule, now you can sit back and relax. All of our lighting services are all-inclusive, which means you don't have to do a single thing. We will take care of everything for you and provide the highest quality lighting products available on the market.

cta.title: Ready to Light Up Your Holidays?
cta.description: Start with a free, no-obligation quote today. It only takes 5-10 seconds!

faq.title: Questions & Answers
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our premium holiday lighting services. Can't find your answer?

items.question: What areas do you serve for Christmas light installation?
items.answer: We serve residential and commercial clients throughout the metro area and surrounding suburbs. Contact us with your address for specific service availability.

items.question: How much does professional installation cost?
items.answer: Pricing varies based on property size and design complexity. Residential installations typically range from $300-$1,500. We provide free, no-obligation quotes after a brief property assessment.

items.question: When should I schedule my installation?
items.answer: We recommend booking 4-6 weeks before your desired installation date. Our schedule fills quickly in November. Early bookings (before October 31) receive priority scheduling.

items.question: What type of lighting do you use?
items.answer: We use commercial-grade LED lights that are energy-efficient, durable, and weather-resistant. All products come with a 3-year warranty and are UL-certified for safety.

items.question: Do you handle maintenance and removal?
items.answer: Yes. We offer maintenance packages and scheduled removal in early January. All services are included in our premium packages.

items.question: Are your installations insured?
items.answer: Absolutely. We carry $2 million in liability insurance and all technicians are trained and certified. Your property is fully protected.
